attributes.action: Boycott the Bejing Olympics Opening Ceremony
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people wish the UK to boycott the Beijng Olympics, to protest China's invasion and occupation of Tibet, and its repression of any protests. But this would ruin the games. This petition aims specifically at the Chinese Government's propaganda efforts centred on the Opening Ceremony, but leaves the ahtletics themselves unaffected.  Other countries are considering the same action.
